item.title: Abandoned van in Somerhill Road, 10th August
item.description:
Red transit parked outside 42/44 Somerhill Road (occupying 2 parking spaces) for over 8 months and has not moved in all that time. Vehicle is untaxed and no MOT and in a state of disrepair.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Somerhill Road, Welling, London

item.title: Constant fly tipping, litter and public urination, 10th August

item.title: Public Bin is needed on Warham street, 10th August
item.description:
This is how street looks like every da. People visiting chicken shoo did not respecting cleanliness at all throwing rubbish on the street full of chicken bones and there's drinks cans, would be grate if council could instal bin on the street that people could get rid ow it there food packaging. Kind regards

item.title: Bale of grass & rubbish fly tipped in bushes on LBG park land, 10th August
item.description:
A large bale of grass has been fly tipped in bushes, below pavement level, 50 metres from entrance to Shooters Hill Golf Club in Eaglesfield Rd SE18 3DA. It has been there for more than 4 weeks & this will be the 3RD TIME I HAVE REPORTED IT !! IF IT IS NOT REMOVED IN THE NEXT COUPLE OF WEEKS, AN OFFICIAL COMPLAINT WILL BE MADE.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eaglesfield Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
